Package dbAPI

Interface IDatabase

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<ITable>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDatabase
public interface IDatabase
extends java.lang.Iterable<ITable>
An interface that represents a database

  • Method Summary

    Close the database

      Returns:

      Update a specified table with values from a specified row
      Parameters:
      table - The table which is updated
      row - The row to take values from

    • update

      void update​(ITable table, IRow row, java.lang.String whereCondition)
      Update a specified table with values from a specified row with a condition
      Parameters:
      table - The table which is updated
      row - The row to take values from
      whereCondition - The condition in sql format(without 'WHERE')

      Parameters:

      Returns:
